# Online Learning System — Auto Documentation

## Overview
Static multi‑page online learning (LMS) template (HTML/CSS/JS). This README was generated from the uploaded archive.

```

├─ assets

├─ 404.html

├─ admin-dashboard.html

├─ categories.html

├─ course.html
├─ faq.html
├─ index.html
├─ learn.html
├─ quiz.html

```

## Local Preview

  - Node: `npx serve .`
